commands.name: /help
commands.description: 显示所有可用命令

commands.name: /add <files>
commands.description: 添加文件到上下文

commands.name: /drop <files>
commands.description: 从上下文中移除文件

commands.name: /commit
commands.description: 创建 git commit

commands.name: /approvals
commands.description: choose what Codex can do without approval

commands.name: /review
commands.description: review my current changes and find issues

commands.name: /new
commands.description: start a new chat during a conversation

commands.name: /init
commands.description: create an AGENTS.md file with instructions for Codex

commands.name: /compact
commands.description: summarize conversation to prevent hitting the context limit

commands.name: /undo
commands.description: ask Codex to undo a turn

commands.name: /diff
commands.description: show git diff (including untracked files)

commands.name: /mention
commands.description: mention a file (or use @ to review specific files)

commands.name: /status
commands.description: Shows information about the current model and context usage

commands.name: /model
commands.description: Allows changing the AI model or reasoning level

commands.name: /clear
commands.description: Clears conversation history

commands.name: /exit
commands.description: 退出 Codex

claude.description: Anthropic Claude Code - AI coding assistant

commands.name: /help
commands.description: Get usage help

commands.name: /add-dir
commands.description: Add additional working directories

commands.name: /agents
commands.description: Manage custom AI subagents for specialized tasks

commands.name: /bug
commands.description: Report bugs (sends conversation to Anthropic)

commands.name: /clear
commands.description: Clear conversation history

commands.description: Compact conversation with optional focus instructions

commands.name: /config
commands.description: Open the Settings interface (Config tab)

commands.name: /cost
commands.description: Show token usage statistics

commands.name: /doctor
commands.description: Checks the health of your Claude Code installation

commands.description: Initialize project with CLAUDE.md guide

commands.name: /review
commands.description: Request code review

commands.description: Enable sandboxed bash tool with filesystem and network isolation

commands.name: /rewind
commands.description: Rewind the conversation and/or code

commands.name: /status
commands.description: Open the Settings interface (Status tab)

commands.description: Install Shift+Enter key binding for newlines (iTerm2 and VSCode only)

commands.name: /usage

commands.name: /vim
commands.description: Enter vim mode for alternating insert and command modes

commands.name: /help
commands.description: Displays available commands and usage (or use /?)

commands.name: /about
commands.description: Displays version information

commands.description: Configures authentication methods

commands.description: Manages conversation history (save, resume, list, delete, share)

commands.description: Replaces the current chat context with a summary

commands.name: /ide

commands.description: Initializes a project

commands.description: Manages the AI's instructional context from GEMINI.md files

commands.description: Manages Model Context Protocol servers
